comment._content: This photo is earlier than 1895 as Alexandra Hall has not yet been constructed at the end of "the Prom".

The picture is taken from Constitution Hill.

comment.author: 21672649@N00
comment._content:
The modern accepted name for the town is Aberystwyth. I realise that the older and variable spelling of "Aberystwith" is used from the card itself and you have also tagged it as Aberystwyth byt it might also be useful in the photo title or description too.

Suberb scans and interesting viewing too by the way. Thank you very much!
